Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2017 01:39PM - edited Jan 11, 2017 09:04PM by TooTicky I slep in mine for two weeks. The first 10 days were because I was more comfortable... And the last couple were because it was warmer in our living room than our bedroom and shivering hurt like heck. :-
